definition: Yokosuka (port and navy base in the Tokyo bay)

horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
Yokosuka city and US naval base to the west of Yokohama, Japan

sentences.english: He is now on the Yokosuka Navy Base with his family.
sentences.chinese: 他现在和他的家人一起待在美军的横须贺海军基地里。

sentences.english: Yoshi Ikeda, 34, works at the US Navy Base pool in Yokosuka, Japan.
sentences.chinese: 34岁，在驻日美军在横须贺的海军基地里任职。

sentences.english: The 7th Fleet is the United States Navy's permanent forward projection force based in Yokosuka in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 美国海军第七舰队司令部驻扎在日本横须贺。
